title: No team gravity summoner icon?
body: umm i know this is nothing serious but why is there no team gravity summoner icon? i go into the shop to buy it and also a team liquid icon but the team gravity one isnt there maybe my Leagues bugging out or maybe they just didn't make one don't know why tho but if someone can let me know what's going on with it that would be nice. thanks.

replies.body: They finalised their icon a little late and as a result it will be released soon! I was upset about this too and can't wait to support my boy Saint!{{summoner:11}}
